sentences.sentence: Advances in computers and biophysics have started a micro miniature revolution that allows scientists to envision and in some cases actually build microscopic machines.
sentences.translation: 计算机和生物物理学的进步开启了一场微型革命，让科学家们可以进行设想，甚至在某些情况下他们还可以建造微型机器。

sentences.sentence: Credit: Oliver Braubach, Department of Physiology &Biophysics, Dalhousie University, Halifax, Nova Scotia. (3rd place)
sentences.translation: 图片提供者：加拿大新斯科舍省哈利法克斯达尔豪西大学生理学和生物物理学系的奥利弗·布劳巴赫(Oliver Braubach)。

sentences.sentence: Now we have a biomaterial that we can program at the nanoscale to address questions in biophysics or nanochemistry.
sentences.translation: 现在我们有了一个可以在纳米尺度上进行编程设计的生物材料，用以解决生物物理或纳米化学方面的问题。
